caption.p: NLRC5 expression is upregulated after AIV infection. The heat map shows the expression of three Nod Like Receptor (NLR) genes in primary chicken lung cells at 24 h after infection with LPAIV A/mallard/duck/England/7277/06 (LPAI-H2N3), classical lineage HPAIV A/turkey/England/50-92/91 (H5N1-tyEng91) or contemporary Eurasian lineage HPAIV A/turkey/Turkey/1/05 (H5N1-tyTR05). Color corresponds to the expression levels of each gene from 0 (low expression) to >5 (high expression).
